\"using System;\\nusing System.Text;\\nusing System.Threading.Tasks;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\nusing UnityEngine.Networking;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.Editor\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// DeepSeek API客户端\\n /// 用于调用DeepSeek生成Action描述\\n /// </summary>\\n public class DeepSeekClient\\n {\\n private const string API_URL = \\\"https://api.deepseek.com/v1/chat/completions\\\";\\n private readonly string apiKey;\\n\\n public DeepSeekClient(string apiKey)\\n {\\n this.apiKey = apiKey;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 生成Action描述\\n /// </summary>\\n /// <param name=\\\"actionTypeName\\\">Action类型名</param>\\n /// <param name=\\\"actionCode\\\">Action源代码</param>\\n /// <param name=\\\"existingDisplayName\\\">现有的显示名称（如果有）</param>\\n /// <param name=\\\"existingCategory\\\">现有的分类（如果有）</param>\\n /// <returns>生成的描述数据</returns>\\n public async Task<ActionDescriptionResult> GenerateActionDescriptionAsync(\\n string actionTypeName,\\n string actionCode,\\n string existingDisplayName = null,\\n string existingCategory = null)\\n {\\n // 构建提示词\\n string prompt = BuildPrompt(actionTypeName, actionCode, existingDisplayName, existingCategory);\\n\\n // 调用API\\n string response = await CallDeepSeekAPI(prompt);\\n\\n // 解析响应\\n return ParseResponse(response, actionTypeName);\\n }\\n\\n private string BuildPrompt(string typeName, string code, string displayName, string category)\\n {\\n StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\\n\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"你是一个Unity技能系统的专家，负责为Action脚本生成高质量的描述文本，用于RAG语义搜索系统。\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# 任务\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine($\\\"分析以下Action类的源代码，生成结构化的描述信息：\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# Action源代码\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"```csharp\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(code);\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"```\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# 输出要求\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"请以JSON格式输出，包含以下字段：\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"{\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\" \\\\\\\"displayName\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"简短的中文显示名称（2-4个字）\\\\\\\",\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\" \\\\\\\"category\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"分类（Movement/Control/Damage/Visual/Audio/Buff等）\\\\\\\",\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\" \\\\\\\"description\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"详细的功能描述（150-300字）\\\\\\\",\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\" \\\\\\\"searchKeywords\\\\\\\": \\\\\\\"逗号分隔的搜索关键词（5-10个）\\\\\\\"\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"}\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# description字段编写规范\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"1. **核心功能**：用1-2句话概括Action的核心功能\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"2. **详细说明**：说明支持的主要参数、模式、配置项\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"3. **使用场景**：列举3-5个典型的使用场景或示例技能\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"4. **关键区别**：强调与其他相似Action的区别（例如\\\\\\\"纯粹位移，不包含伤害和控制效果\\\\\\\"）\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"5. **中英混合**：关键术语使用中英文混合（如\\\\\\\"线性移动(Linear)\\\\\\\"），提高搜索匹配率\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# searchKeywords字段编写规范\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"包含：\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 功能相关的中文词汇（如：位移、移动、冲刺、闪现）\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 英文术语（如：movement、teleport、dash）\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 典型技能名称（如：闪现、跳斩、冲锋）\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- DOTA2/LOL中的类似技能\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n\\n if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(displayName))\\n {\\n sb.AppendLine($\\\"# 现有信息（可参考但不强制使用）\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine($\\\"- 显示名称：{displayName}\\\");\\n if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(category))\\n {\\n sb.AppendLine($\\\"- 分类：{category}\\\");\\n }\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n }\\n\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"# 注意事项\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- description必须包含足够的关键词，确保RAG搜索时能准确匹配\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 如果Action名称包含控制类型（如ControlAction有Stun/Silence/Root等），必须全部列举\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 强调Action的独特性，避免与其他Action混淆\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"- 使用中文为主，关键术语中英混合\\\");\\n sb.AppendLine();\\n sb.AppendLine(\\\"请直接输出JSON，不要包含其他解释文字。\\\");\\n\\n return sb.ToString();\\n }\\n\\n private async Task<string> CallDeepSeekAPI(string prompt)\\n {\\n // 构建请求体（使用可序列化的类）\\n var requestBody = new ChatCompletionRequest\\n {\\n model = \\\"deepseek-chat\\\",\\n messages = new ChatMessage[]\\n {\\n new ChatMessage { role = \\\"user\\\", content = prompt }\\n },\\n temperature = 0.3f, // 较低温度，保证输出稳定\\n max_tokens = 1000\\n };\\n\\n string jsonBody = JsonUtility.ToJson(requestBody);\\n\\n // 创建请求\\n using (UnityWebRequest request = new UnityWebRequest(API_URL, \\\"POST\\\"))\\n {\\n byte[] bodyRaw = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(jsonBody);\\n request.uploadHandler = new UploadHandlerRaw(bodyRaw);\\n request.downloadHandler = new DownloadHandlerBuffer();\\n request.SetRequestHeader(\\\"Content-Type\\\", \\\"application/json\\\");\\n request.SetRequestHeader(\\\"Authorization\\\", $\\\"Bearer {apiKey}\\\");\\n\\n // 发送请求\\n var operation = request.SendWebRequest();\\n\\n // 等待完成（使用TaskCompletionSource实现async/await）\\n var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();\\n operation.completed += _ {request.error}\\\\n{request.downloadHandler.text}\\\");\\n }\\n\\n // 返回响应\\n return request.downloadHandler.text;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n private ActionDescriptionResult ParseResponse(string responseJson, 提取JSON内容（去除可能的markdown代码块标记）\\n content = content.Trim();\\n if (content.StartsWith(\\\"```json\\\"))\\n {\\n content = content.Substring(7);\\n }\\n if (content.StartsWith(\\\"```\\\"))\\n {\\n content = content.Substring(3);\\n }\\n if (content.EndsWith(\\\"```\\\"))\\n {\\n content = content.Substring(0, content.Length - 3);\\n }\\n content = content.Trim();\\n\\n // 解析Action描述JSON\\n var result = JsonUtility.FromJson<ActionDescriptionResult>(content);\\n result.success = true;\\n return result;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"解析DeepSeek响应失败: {"messageId":"019a3e607427702d84f2ec06cf175ff5","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e607427702d84f2ec06cf175ff5","conversation_id":"019a3e6039977f6f9a867825a3886aec","content":"好的，asmdef已经引用了`SkillSystem.Editor`，所以应该能访问`DeepSeekClient`。但是`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`的命名空间是`SkillSystem.Editor`，而asmdef的rootNamespace是`SkillSystem.RAG`。这可能导致命名空间冲突。

让我检查DescriptionManagerWindow的完整using语句，看看是否缺少必要的引用。从附件中我看到它已经有`using SkillSystem.Editor.Data;`，但可能需要确保能访问到`DeepSeekClient`。

实际上，问题很明显：**`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`的命名空间是`SkillSystem.Editor`，但它在`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor`程序集中，而该程序集的rootNamespace是`SkillSystem.RAG`**。

解决方案有两个：
1. 将`DeepSeekClient`移动到RAG系统中
2. 修改`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`的命名空间为`SkillSystem.RAG`

我选择方案2，因为这个文件本身就在RAG系统中。让我修复："},"timestamp":1761983199,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

只有一些警告（warnings），没有错误（errors）。这些警告是关于：

这些都是代码质量问题，不影响编译。

## 修复总结

我修复了以下问题：

1. **命名空间不匹配**：将 [`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`](E:/Study/wqaetly/ai_agent_for_skill/ai_agent_for_skill/Assets/Scripts/RAGSystem/Editor/DescriptionManagerWindow.cs) 的命名空间从 `SkillSystem.Editor` 改为 `SkillSystem.RAG`，以匹配程序集定义文件中的 `rootNamespace`

2. **命名空间不匹配**：将 [`ActionExportModels.cs`](E:/Study/wqaetly/ai_agent_for_skill/ai_agent_for_skill/Assets/Scripts/RAGSystem/Editor/ActionExportModels.cs) 的命名空间从 `SkillSystem.Editor` 改为 `SkillSystem.RAG`

3. **缺少文件引用**：在 [`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor.csproj`](E:/Study/wqaetly/ai_agent_for_skill/ai_agent_for_skill/SkillSystem.RAG.Editor.csproj) 中添加了 `ActionExportModels.cs` 的编译引用

4. **保留必要的using**：添加了 `using SkillSystem.Editor;` 以访问 `DeepSeekClient` 类

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"## 问题分析

**【核心判断】**
✅ 这是个真问题 - 命名空间引用缺失

**【关键洞察】**
- **数据结构**：`ActionFile`类定义在`ActionExportModels.cs`中，命名空间是`SkillSystem.Editor`
- **复杂度**：问题很简单 - `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`第445行使用了`ActionFile`类型，但文件顶部的using语句中已经有`using SkillSystem.Editor.Data;`，却没有直接引用`ActionFile`所在的命名空间
- **风险点**：虽然两个文件都在`SkillSystem.Editor`命名空间下，但C#编译器在第445行找不到`ActionFile`类型定义

**【问题根源】**
看代码，`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`已经声明了`namespace SkillSystem.Editor`，而`ActionFile`也在同一个命名空间`SkillSystem.Editor`中。理论上不应该找不到。

让我检查第445行具体是什么：

```csharp
// 第445行
var actionFile = BuildActionFile(entry);
```

而`BuildActionFile`方法返回类型是`ActionFile`（第443行）：
```csharp
private ActionFile BuildActionFile(ActionEntry entry)
```

**问题是**：两个文件都在同一个命名空间`SkillSystem.Editor`下，应该能互相访问。这个编译错误很奇怪。

让我检查程序集定义文件："},"timestamp":1761982129,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

EOF no more lines ...\\n\", \"fileSize\": \"506 Byte\", \"isBigFile\": false, \"totalLines\": 22}"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"**【找到问题了！】**

**垃圾设计！** 

看到问题了：
1. `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`在`SkillSystem.Editor`命名空间下
2. `ActionExportModels.cs`也在`SkillSystem.Editor`命名空间下
3. **但是**，asmdef文件的`rootNamespace`设置为`SkillSystem.RAG`！

这导致了命名空间混乱：
- asmdef说："这个程序集的根命名空间是`SkillSystem.RAG`"
- 但代码文件却声明自己在`SkillSystem.Editor`命名空间

**【Linus式方案】**

有两个修复方案：

**方案1（推荐）**：把`ActionExportModels.cs`的命名空间改为与asmdef一致
- 改为`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor`或`SkillSystem.RAG`
- 然后在`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`中添加对应的using

**方案2**：修改asmdef的rootNamespace
- 但这可能影响其他文件

我选择**方案1** - 最小破坏性，最清晰。"},"timestamp":1761982144,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"**【问题更清楚了】**

这个目录下所有文件都在同一个asmdef（`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor.asmdef`）下，但是：
- `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`声明命名空间为`SkillSystem.Editor`
- `ActionExportModels.cs`我刚改成了`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor`
- 但asmdef的rootNamespace是`SkillSystem.RAG`

**真正的问题**：`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`应该也在`SkillSystem.RAG.Editor`命名空间下，而不是`SkillSystem.Editor`！

让我检查其他文件的命名空间："},"timestamp":1761982174,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"**【命名空间一团糟！】** 

看到了吗？同一个asmdef下的文件，命名空间完全混乱：
- `EditorRAGClient.cs` → `SkillSystem.RAG`
- `RAGEditorIntegration.cs` → `SkillSystem.RAG`
- `SkillRAGWindow.cs` → `SkillSystem.RAG`
- `SmartActionInspector.cs` → `SkillSystem.RAG`
- `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` → `SkillSystem.Editor` ❌
- `ActionExportModels.cs` → `SkillSystem.RAG.Editor` (我刚改的)
- `Data/ActionDescriptionData.cs` → `SkillSystem.Editor.Data` ❌
- `Data/ActionDescriptionDatabase.cs` → `SkillSystem.Editor.Data` ❌

**【Linus的判断】**

这是典型的"没有规划就开始写代码"的结果。命名空间应该统一！

**最简单的修复方案**：
1. 把`ActionExportModels.cs`改回`SkillSystem.Editor`（撤销我刚才的修改）
2. 在`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`中不需要额外的using，因为它们在同一个命名空间

让我撤销刚才的修改："},"timestamp":1761982183,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"完美！现在：
- `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`在`namespace SkillSystem.Editor`
- `ActionExportModels.cs`也在`namespace SkillSystem.Editor`
- 两个文件在同一个命名空间下，应该能互相访问

**但是**，我注意到一个潜在问题：`ParameterInfo`这个类名可能与.NET Framework的`System.Reflection.ParameterInfo`冲突！

看第5行：`using System.Reflection;`

这会导致`ParameterInfo`产生歧义。让我检查第445行附近的代码："},"timestamp":1761982234,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"type":"TOOL_CALL_RESULT","timestamp":1761982238,"rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","tool_call_id":"tooluse_Vcdce0qoRUGhrrFwqDpZtQ","result":{}},"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","toolCallId":"tooluse_Vcdce0qoRUGhrrFwqDpZtQ","content":"{\"content\": \"... 439 lines before line 440 ...\\n Log($\\\"[导出失败] {e.Message}\\\");\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"导出失败\\\", e.Message, \\\"确定\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n\\n private ActionFile BuildActionFile(ActionEntry entry)\\n {\\n // 从反射获取完整的参数信息\\n var actionType = Assembly.GetAssembly(typeof(ISkillAction))\\n .GetTypes()\\n .FirstOrDefault(t => t.Name == entry.typeName);\\n\\n var definition = new ActionDefinition\\n {\\n typeName = entry.typeName,\\n fullTypeName = entry.fullTypeName,\\n namespaceName = entry.namespaceName,\\n assemblyName = actionType?.Assembly.GetName().Name ?? \\\"\\\",\\n displayName = entry.displayName,\\n category = entry.category,\\n description = entry.description,\\n searchText = BuildSearchText(entry),\\n parameters = ExtractParameters(actionType)\\n };\\n\\n return new ActionFile\\n {\\n version = \\\"1.0\\\",\\n exportTime = DateTime.Now.ToString(\\\"o\\\"),\\n action = definition\\n };\\n... extra lines ...\\n\", \"fileSize\": \"32.97 KB\", \"isBigFile\": false, \"totalLines\": 941}"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"好的，第445行是`private ActionFile BuildActionFile(ActionEntry entry)`。

现在两个文件都在同一个命名空间`SkillSystem.Editor`下，理论上应该没问题了。

**但是**，我怀疑问题可能是：
1. Unity的编译器缓存问题
2. 或者`ParameterInfo`类名冲突（与`System.Reflection.ParameterInfo`）

让我检查`ExtractParameters`方法，看看是否有`ParameterInfo`的使用冲突："},"timestamp":1761982243,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"type":"TOOL_CALL_RESULT","timestamp":1761982246,"rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","tool_call_id":"tooluse_pVpfXbY9Rn-tMkBaqvx6_g","result":{}},"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","toolCallId":"tooluse_pVpfXbY9Rn-tMkBaqvx6_g","content":"{\"content\": \"... 499 lines before line 500 ...\\n var parameters = new List<ParameterInfo>();\\n var fields = actionType.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);\\n\\n object instance = null;\\n try { instance = Activator.CreateInstance(actionType); } catch { }\\n\\n foreach (var field in fields)\\n {\\n if (field.DeclaringType == typeof(ISkillAction))\\n continue;\\n\\n var param = new ParameterInfo\\n {\\n name = field.Name,\\n type = GetFriendlyTypeName(field.FieldType),\\n isArray = field.FieldType.IsArray,\\n isEnum = field.FieldType.IsEnum\\n };\\n\\n if (instance != null)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n object value = field.GetValue(instance);\\n param.defaultValue = SerializeValue(value);\\n }\\n catch { param.defaultValue = \\\"null\\\"; }\\n }\\n\\n ExtractOdinAttributes(field, param);\\n\\n if (field.FieldType.IsEnum)\\n {\\n param.enumValues = Enum.GetNames(field.FieldType).ToList();\\n }\\n\\n if (field.FieldType.IsArray)\\n {\\n param.elementType = GetFriendlyTypeName(field.FieldType.GetElementType());\\n }\\n\\n parameters.Add(param);\\n }\\n\\n return parameters;\\n }\\n\\n private void ExtractOdinAttributes(FieldInfo field, ParameterInfo param)\\n {\\n var labelAttr = field.GetCustomAttribute<LabelTextAttribute>();\\n if (labelAttr != null) param.label = labelAttr.Text;\\n... extra lines ...\\n\", \"fileSize\": \"32.97 KB\", \"isBigFile\": false, \"totalLines\": 941}"}

{"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"**【找到真正的问题了！】** 

看第500行和512行：
```csharp
var parameters = new List<ParameterInfo>(); // 第500行
...
var param = new ParameterInfo { ... }; // 第512行
```

这里的`ParameterInfo`与`System.Reflection.ParameterInfo`产生了**命名冲突**！

因为文件顶部有`using System.Reflection;`，编译器不知道你要用的是：
- `System.Reflection.ParameterInfo`（.NET Framework的类）
- 还是`SkillSystem.Editor.ParameterInfo`（你自己定义的类）

**【Linus式解决方案】**

有两个方案：

**方案1（推荐）**：重命名自定义的`ParameterInfo`类，避免与.NET Framework冲突
- 改名为`ActionParameterInfo`

**方案2**：在使用时明确指定命名空间
- 使用`SkillSystem.Editor.ParameterInfo`

我选择**方案1** - 改名，这是最干净的解决方案。"},"timestamp":1761982251,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

{"type":"TOOL_CALL_RESULT","timestamp":1761982292,"rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","tool_call_id":"tooluse__dcjGB83R4-_llSbqDoqPQ","result":{}},"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","toolCallId":"tooluse__dcjGB83R4-_llSbqDoqPQ","content":"{\"content\": \"using System;\\nusing System.Collections.Generic;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.Editor\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// Action导出JSON文件的根对象\\n /// </summary>\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ActionFile\\n {\\n public string version;\\n public string exportTime;\\n public ActionDefinition action;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// Action定义数据\\n /// </summary>\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ActionDefinition\\n {\\n public string typeName;\\n public string fullTypeName;\\n public string namespaceName;\\n public string assemblyName;\\n public string displayName;\\n public string category;\\n public string description;\\n public string searchText;\\n public List<ActionParameterInfo> parameters;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// Action参数信息\\n /// </summary>\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ActionParameterInfo\\n {\\n public string name;\\n public string type;\\n public string defaultValue;\\n public string label;\\n public string group;\\n public string infoBox;\\n public bool isArray;\\n public bool isEnum;\\n public string elementType;\\n public List<string> enumValues;\\n public ParameterConstraints constraints;\\n\\n public ActionParameterInfo()\\n {\\n constraints = new ParameterConstraints();\\n enumValues = new List<string>();\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 参数约束信息\\n /// </summary>\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ParameterConstraints\\n {\\n public string minValue;\\n public string maxValue;\\n public string min;\\n public string max;\\n }\\n}\\n\\n... {"messageId":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e51666d711c95d434ca9dda8c06","conversation_id":"019a3e5125f97e6ca71215e50074d5c8","content":"完美！所有的`ParameterInfo`都已经替换为`ActionParameterInfo`了。

## 总结

**【问题根源】** 

这是个**命名冲突**问题，不是命名空间缺失问题：

1. `ActionExportModels.cs`定义了一个`ParameterInfo`类
2. `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`使用了`using System.Reflection;`
3. `.NET Framework`的`System.Reflection`命名空间中也有一个`ParameterInfo`类
4. 编译器无法区分你要用哪个`ParameterInfo`，导致编译错误

**【解决方案】** ✅

将自定义的`ParameterInfo`类重命名为`ActionParameterInfo`，彻底避免命名冲突：

1. ✅ 修改`ActionExportModels.cs`：`ParameterInfo` → `ActionParameterInfo`
2. ✅ 修改`DescriptionManagerWindow.cs`中所有5处引用

**【Linus的评价】**

这是典型的"没有考虑命名空间污染"的问题。

**好的命名规则**：
- 永远不要用与标准库相同的类名，除非你明确知道自己在做什么
- `ParameterInfo`这种通用名称，在`System.Reflection`中已经存在
- 应该用更具体的名称，比如`ActionParameterInfo`

**"Good taste"体现在命名上**：
- 好的命名让代码自解释
- 避免歧义和冲突
- 让编译器和人类都能一眼看懂

现在编译错误应该已经解决了。在Unity中重新编译应该不会再报错。"},"timestamp":1761982311,"type":"TEXT_MESSAGE_CONTENT"}

entry.value:
# RAG系统代码清理
## 清理日期 2025-11-01
## 问题分析
RAG相关代码存在严重的冗余和职责不清问题：
### 核心问题 1. **重复的HTTP客户端**: `RAGClient.cs` 和 `EditorRAGClient.cs` 功能重叠 2. **重复的管理窗口**: `ActionDescriptionGeneratorWindow.cs` 和 `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 功能完全重叠 3. **独立的导出工具**: `ActionToJsonExporter.cs` 功能已被 `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 集成
### 数据结构混乱 - 两个HTTP客户端使用不同的底层库（UnityWebRequest vs HttpClient） - 两个管理窗口操作同一个数据库，可能导致数据不一致 - 用户不知道该使用哪个工具
## 清理方案
### 删除的文件
#### 1. RAGClient.cs ❌ **删除原因**: - 功能被 `EditorRAGClient.cs` 完全覆盖 - 只有2个方法（`RebuildIndexAsync`, `CheckStatusAsync`） - `EditorRAGClient.cs` 提供完整的API（搜索、推荐、索引、统计等） - 使用UnityWebRequest在Editor环境不如HttpClient合适
#### 2. ActionDescriptionGeneratorWindow.cs ❌ **删除原因**: - 功能被 `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 完全覆盖 - `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 是升级版，增加了： - 工作流自动化（一键发布） - 更好的UI布局（Tab分组） - 集成了JSON导出功能 - 集成了RAG索引重建功能
#### 3. ActionToJsonExporter.cs ❌ **删除原因**: - 功能已被 `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 集成 - 独立存在没有必要，增加维护成本 - `DescriptionManagerWindow.cs` 提供了完整的工作流（生成→保存→导出→索引）
### 保留的核心文件
#### 1. EditorRAGClient.cs ✅ **职责**: 唯一的RAG服务HTTP客户端 - 提供完整的API（搜索、推荐、索引、统计、缓存） - 同时支持同步和异步调用 - 使用HttpClient，适合Editor环境
#### 2. DescriptionManagerWindow.cs ✅ **职责**: 统一的Action描述管理界面 - AI生成Action描述 - 保存到ScriptableObject数据库 - 导出JSON文件 - 重建RAG索引 - 一键自动化工作流
#### 3. SkillRAGWindow.cs ✅ **职责**: RAG查询和测试界面 - 技能搜索 - Action推荐 - 服务器管理（启动/停止Python服务器） - 索引管理
#### 4. RAGEditorIntegration.cs ✅ **职责**: RAG功能集成到Unity编辑器 - 编辑器启动时初始化 - 提供Preferences设置界面 - 菜单项集成
#### 5. SmartActionInspector.cs ✅ **职责**: Action Inspector中的AI参数建议 - 在Action编辑时提供智能参数推荐 - 基于相似技能的参数配置 - 一键应用参数
## 代码修改
### DescriptionManagerWindow.cs **修改内容**: 替换 `RAGClient` 为 `EditorRAGClient`
**修改位置**: 1. `RebuildRAGIndexAsync()` 方法 2. `RebuildRAGIndexSilentAsync()` 方法
**API适配**: ```csharp // 旧代码 var client = new RAGClient("http://127.0.0.1:8765"); var result = await client.RebuildIndexAsync(); // result.success, result.actionCount, result.skillCount, result.error
// 新代码 using (var client = new EditorRAGClient()) { var result = await UniTask.RunOnThreadPool(async () => { return await client.TriggerIndexAsync(forceRebuild: true); }); // result.status, result.count, result.elapsed_time, result.message } ```
## 清理效果
### 文件数量 - **清理前**: 9个文件 - **清理后**: 5个文件 - **减少**: 44%
### 职责清晰度 - ✅ 每个文件职责单一明确 - ✅ 没有功能重叠 - ✅ 用户知道该用哪个工具
### 维护成本 - ✅ 减少代码重复 - ✅ 统一API调用方式 - ✅ 降低数据不一致风险
## 使用指南
### 开发者工作流
1. **生成Action描述**: 使用 `DescriptionManagerWindow` - 菜单: `技能系统 > 描述管理器` - 功能: AI生成、手动编辑、保存、导出、索引
2. **测试RAG搜索**: 使用 `SkillRAGWindow` - 菜单: `技能系统 > RAG查询窗口` - 功能: 搜索技能、推荐Action、管理服务器
3. **编辑Action时获取建议**: 自动集成 - 在Action Inspector中自动显示AI参数建议 - 由 `SmartActionInspector` 提供
### 一键发布流程
使用 `DescriptionManagerWindow` 的 **" 一键生成并发布所有Action"** 按钮：
1. 扫描所有Action 2. AI生成缺失的描述 3. 保存到数据库 4. 导出JSON文件 5. 重建RAG索引
## 注意事项
1. **删除的文件不可恢复**: 如果需要回滚，请从Git历史恢复 2. **菜单项变化**: 删除了 `Tools/Skill RAG/Export Actions to JSON` 菜单 3. **API变化**: 所有使用 `RAGClient` 的代码需要改用 `EditorRAGClient`
## 编译验证
清理后需要验证编译： ```bash dotnet build Assets/Scripts/RAGSystem/Editor/SkillSystem.RAG.Editor.asmdef ```
确保没有编译错误。

{"type":"TOOL_CALL_RESULT","timestamp":1761981289,"rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e44927f7b52bfdfa8b426a635a4","conversation_id":"019a3e41c3097830bb8f8fa1df376e34","tool_call_id":"tooluse_2oSGHPdRQxWDgSoAb6q1FA","result":{}},"messageId":"019a3e44927f7b52bfdfa8b426a635a4","toolCallId":"tooluse_2oSGHPdRQxWDgSoAb6q1FA","content":"{\"content\": \"using System;\\nusing System.Text;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\nusing UnityEngine.Networking;\\nusing Cysharp.Threading.Tasks;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.RAG.Editor\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// RAG服务器HTTP客户端\\n /// 用于与Python RAG服务器通信\\n /// </summary>\\n public class RAGClient\\n {\\n private readonly string baseUrl;\\n\\n public RAGClient(string url)\\n {\\n baseUrl = url.TrimEnd('/');\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 重建RAG索引\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<RebuildIndexResult> RebuildIndexAsync()\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/rebuild_index\\\";\\n\\n using (var request = UnityWebRequest.PostWwwForm(url, \\\"\\\"))\\n {\\n request.timeout = 120; // 重建索引可能需要较长时间\\n\\n await request.SendWebRequest();\\n\\n if (request.result == UnityWebRequest.Result.Success)\\n {\\n var response = JsonUtility.FromJson<RebuildIndexResponse>(request.downloadHandler.text);\\n return new RebuildIndexResult\\n {\\n success = true,\\n actionCount = response.action_count,\\n skillCount = response.skill_count,\\n message = response.message\\n };\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n return new RebuildIndexResult\\n {\\n success = false,\\n error = $\\\"HTTP {request.responseCode}: {request.error}\\\"\\n };\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n return new RebuildIndexResult\\n {\\n success = false,\\n error = e.Message\\n };\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 检查服务器状态\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<ServerStatusResult> CheckStatusAsync()\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/health\\\";\\n\\n using (var request = UnityWebRequest.Get(url))\\n {\\n request.timeout = 5;\\n\\n await request.SendWebRequest();\\n\\n if (request.result == UnityWebRequest.Result.Success)\\n {\\n var response = JsonUtility.FromJson<HealthResponse>(request.downloadHandler.text);\\n return new ServerStatusResult\\n {\\n isRunning = response.status == \\\"ok\\\",\\n message = response.message\\n };\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n return new ServerStatusResult\\n {\\n isRunning = false,\\n message = $\\\"服务器无响应: {request.error}\\\"\\n };\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n return new ServerStatusResult\\n {\\n isRunning = false,\\n message = $\\\"连接失败: {e.Message}\\\"\\n };\\n }\\n }\\n\\n #region 响应数据类\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n private class RebuildIndexResponse\\n {\\n public string status;\\n public string message;\\n public int action_count;\\n public int skill_count;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n private class HealthResponse\\n {\\n public string status;\\n public string message;\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region 结果数据类\\n\\n public class RebuildIndexResult\\n {\\n public bool success;\\n public int actionCount;\\n public int skillCount;\\n public string message;\\n public string error;\\n }\\n\\n public class ServerStatusResult\\n {\\n public bool isRunning;\\n public string message;\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n }\\n}\\n\\n... EOF no more lines ...\\n\", \"fileSize\": \"4.24 KB\", \"isBigFile\": false, \"totalLines\": 152}"}

{"type":"TOOL_CALL_RESULT","timestamp":1761981290,"rawEvent":{"message_id":"019a3e44927f7b52bfdfa8b426a635a4","conversation_id":"019a3e41c3097830bb8f8fa1df376e34","tool_call_id":"tooluse_CeowsWQ0TGmJkxAMJQzVrg","result":{}},"messageId":"019a3e44927f7b52bfdfa8b426a635a4","toolCallId":"tooluse_CeowsWQ0TGmJkxAMJQzVrg","content":"{\"content\": \"using System;\\nusing System.Collections.Generic;\\nusing System.Net.Http;\\nusing System.Text;\\nusing Cysharp.Threading.Tasks;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.RAG\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// RAG服务HTTP客户端 - Editor专用版本\\n /// 使用UniTask进行异步操作，避免Unity线程问题\\n /// </summary>\\n public class EditorRAGClient: IDisposable\\n {\\n private readonly HttpClient httpClient;\\n private readonly string baseUrl;\\n private readonly int timeout;\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 构造函数\\n /// </summary>\\n /// <param name=\\\"host\\\">服务器地址</param>\\n /// <param name=\\\"port\\\">服务器端口</param>\\n /// <param name=\\\"timeout\\\">请求超时时间（秒）</param>\\n public EditorRAGClient(string host = \\\"127.0.0.1\\\", int port = 8765, int timeout = 30)\\n {\\n this.baseUrl = $\\\"http://{host}:{port}\\\";\\n this.timeout = timeout;\\n\\n // 创建HttpClient实例\\n httpClient = new HttpClient\\n {\\n Timeout = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(timeout)\\n };\\n }\\n\\n #region 数据模型\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class SearchRequest\\n {\\n public string query;\\n public int? top_k;\\n public Dictionary<string, object> filters;\\n public bool return_details;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class SearchResponse\\n {\\n public List<SearchResult> results;\\n public string query;\\n public int count;\\n public string timestamp;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class SearchResult\\n {\\n public string skill_id;\\n public string skill_name;\\n public string file_name;\\n public float similarity;\\n public float distance;\\n public string file_path;\\n public int total_duration;\\n public int frame_rate;\\n public int num_tracks;\\n public int num_actions;\\n public string last_modified;\\n public string search_text_preview;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class RecommendRequest\\n {\\n public string context;\\n public int top_k = 3;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class RecommendResponse\\n {\\n public List<ActionRecommendation> recommendations;\\n public string context;\\n public int count;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ActionRecommendation\\n {\\n public string action_type; // Action类型名（如DamageAction）\\n public string display_name; // 显示名称（如\\\"伤害\\\"）\\n public string category; // 分类（如\\\"Damage\\\"）\\n public string description; // 功能描述\\n public float combined_score; // 综合得分（0-1）\\n public float semantic_similarity; // 语义相似度（0-1）\\n public int frequency; // 在相似技能中的使用频率\\n public List<ActionExample> examples; // 参数示例\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class ActionExample\\n {\\n public string skill_name;\\n public Dictionary<string, object> parameters;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class IndexRequest\\n {\\n public bool force_rebuild = false;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class IndexResponse\\n {\\n public string status;\\n public int count;\\n public float? elapsed_time;\\n public string message;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class HealthResponse\\n {\\n public string status;\\n public string timestamp;\\n }\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n public class StatsResponse\\n {\\n public Dictionary<string, object> statistics;\\n public string timestamp;\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region 同步API方法\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 健康检查（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool CheckHealth(out string status)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n status = CheckHealthAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n status = $\\\"Connection error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 搜索技能（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool SearchSkills(\\n string query,\\n out SearchResponse response,\\n out string error,\\n int? topK = null,\\n bool returnDetails = false)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n response = SearchSkillsAsync(query, topK, returnDetails).GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n error = null;\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n response = null;\\n error = $\\\"Request error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 推荐Action（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool RecommendActions(\\n string context,\\n out RecommendResponse response,\\n out string error,\\n int topK = 3)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n response = RecommendActionsAsync(context, topK).GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n error = null;\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n response = null;\\n error = $\\\"Request error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 触发索引（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool TriggerIndex(\\n bool forceRebuild,\\n out IndexResponse response,\\n out string error)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n response = TriggerIndexAsync(forceRebuild).GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n error = null;\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n response = null;\\n error = $\\\"Request error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 获取统计信息（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool GetStatistics(out StatsResponse response, out string error)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n response = GetStatisticsAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n error = null;\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n response = null;\\n error = $\\\"Request error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 清空缓存（同步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public bool ClearCache(out string message)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n ClearCacheAsync().GetAwaiter().GetResult();\\n message = \\\"Cache cleared successfully\\\";\\n return true;\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n message = $\\\"Request error: {e.Message}\\\";\\n return false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region 异步API方法\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 健康检查（异步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<string> CheckHealthAsync()\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/health\\\";\\n\\n var response = await httpClient.GetAsync(url);\\n response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();\\n\\n string json = await response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();\\n var healthResponse = JsonUtility.FromJson<HealthResponse>(json);\\n return healthResponse.status;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 搜索技能（异步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<SearchResponse> SearchSkillsAsync(\\n string query,\\n int? topK = null,\\n bool returnDetails = false)\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/search?q={Uri.EscapeDataString(query)}\\\";\\n\\n if (topK.HasValue)\\n url += $\\\"&top_k={topK.Value}\\\";\\n\\n if (returnDetails)\\n url += \\\"&details=true\\\";\\n\\n var response = await httpClient.GetAsync(url);\\n response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();\\n\\n string json = await response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();\\n return JsonUtility.FromJson<SearchResponse>(json);\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 推荐Action（异步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<RecommendResponse> RecommendActionsAsync(\\n string context,\\n int topK = 3)\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/recommend\\\";\\n\\n var requestData = new RecommendRequest\\n {\\n context = context,\\n top_k = topK\\n };\\n\\n string json = JsonUtility.ToJson(requestData);\\n var content = new StringContent(json, Encoding.UTF8, \\\"application/json\\\");\\n\\n var response = await httpClient.PostAsync(url, content);\\n response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();\\n\\n string responseJson = await response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();\\n return JsonUtility.FromJson<RecommendResponse>(responseJson);\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 触发索引（异步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<IndexResponse> TriggerIndexAsync(bool forceRebuild = false)\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/index\\\";\\n\\n var requestData = new IndexRequest\\n {\\n force_rebuild = forceRebuild\\n };\\n\\n string json = JsonUtility.ToJson(requestData);\\n var content = new StringContent(json, Encoding.UTF8, \\\"application/json\\\");\\n\\n var response = await httpClient.PostAsync(url, content);\\n response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();\\n\\n string responseJson = await response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync();\\n return JsonUtility.FromJson<IndexResponse>(responseJson);\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 获取统计信息（异步）\\n /// </summary>\\n public async UniTask<StatsResponse> GetStatisticsAsync()\\n {\\n string url = $\\\"{baseUrl}/stats\\\";\\n\\n var response = await httpClient.GetAsync(url);\\n response.EnsureSuccessStatusCode();\\n\\n string json \"using Cysharp.Threading.Tasks;\\nusing UnityEditor;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\nusing SkillSystem.Actions;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.RAG\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// RAG编辑器集成\\n /// 将RAG功能集成到现有的SkillEditor中\\n /// </summary>\\n [InitializeOnLoad]\\n public static class RAGEditorIntegration\\n {\\n private static EditorRAGClient ragClient;\\n private static bool isInitialized = false;\\n\\n // 配置\\n private const string RAG_ENABLED_KEY = \\\"SkillRAG_Enabled\\\";\\n private const string RAG_AUTO_SUGGEST_KEY = \\\"SkillRAG_AutoSuggest\\\";\\n private const string RAG_SERVER_HOST_KEY = \\\"SkillRAG_ServerHost\\\";\\n private const string RAG_SERVER_PORT_KEY = \\\"SkillRAG_ServerPort\\\";\\n\\n // 属性\\n public static bool IsEnabled\\n {\\n get => EditorPrefs.GetBool(RAG_ENABLED_KEY, true);\\n set => EditorPrefs.SetBool(RAG_ENABLED_KEY, value);\\n }\\n\\n public static bool AutoSuggest\\n {\\n get => EditorPrefs.GetBool(RAG_AUTO_SUGGEST_KEY, true);\\n set => EditorPrefs.SetBool(RAG_AUTO_SUGGEST_KEY, value);\\n }\\n\\n public static string ServerHost\\n {\\n get => EditorPrefs.GetString(RAG_SERVER_HOST_KEY, \\\"127.0.0.1\\\");\\n set => EditorPrefs.SetString(RAG_SERVER_HOST_KEY, value);\\n }\\n\\n public static int ServerPort\\n {\\n get => EditorPrefs.GetInt(RAG_SERVER_PORT_KEY, 8765);\\n set => EditorPrefs.SetInt(RAG_SERVER_PORT_KEY, value);\\n }\\n\\n // 静态构造函数（Unity启动时自动调用）\\n static RAGEditorIntegration()\\n {\\n EditorApplication.delayCall += Initialize;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 初始化RAG集成\\n /// </summary>\\n private static void Initialize()\\n {\\n if (isInitialized)\\n return;\\n\\n if (!IsEnabled)\\n {\\n Debug.Log(\\\"[RAG] RAG功能已禁用\\\");\\n return;\\n }\\n\\n ragClient = new EditorRAGClient(ServerHost, ServerPort);\\n\\n // 初始化SmartActionInspector\\n SmartActionInspector.Initialize();\\n\\n isInitialized = true;\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[RAG] RAG编辑器集成已初始化 (服务器: {ServerHost}:{ServerPort})\\\");\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 在ActionInspector中绘制RAG建议（由ActionInspector调用）\\n /// </summary>\\n public static void DrawActionRAGSuggestions(ISkillAction action)\\n {\\n if (!IsEnabled || !isInitialized || !AutoSuggest)\\n return;\\n\\n SmartActionInspector.DrawSmartSuggestions(action);\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 搜索相似技能（可从SkillEditor调用）\\n /// </summary>\\n public static async UniTaskVoid SearchSimilarSkills(string query, System.Action<bool, EditorRAGClient.SearchResponse> callback)\\n {\\n if (!isInitialized)\\n {\\n callback?.Invoke(false, null);\\n return;\\n }\\n\\n try\\n {\\n // 在后台线程执行HTTP请求\\n var response = await UniTask.RunOnThreadPool(async () =>\\n {\\n return await ragClient.SearchSkillsAsync(query, 5, true);\\n });\\n\\n callback?.Invoke(true, response);\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[RAG] 搜索异常: {e}\\\");\\n callback?.Invoke(false, null);\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 添加RAG设置到Preferences\\n /// </summary>\\n [SettingsProvider]\\n public static SettingsProvider CreateRAGSettingsProvider()\\n {\\n var provider = new SettingsProvider(\\\"Preferences/技能系统/RAG设置\\\", SettingsScope.User)\\n {\\n label = \\\"RAG设置\\\",\\n\\n guiHandler = (searchContext) =>\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"技能RAG系统设置\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n EditorGUI.BeginChangeCheck();\\n\\n // 启用/禁用\\n bool newEnabled = EditorGUILayout.Toggle(\\\"启用RAG功能\\\", IsEnabled);\\n\\n EditorGUI.BeginDisabledGroup(!newEnabled);\\n\\n // 自动建议\\n bool newAutoSuggest = EditorGUILayout.Toggle(\\\"自动显示参数建议\\\", AutoSuggest);\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"服务器配置\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n\\n // 服务器地址\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"服务器地址:\\\", GUILayout.Width(100));\\n string newHost = EditorGUILayout.TextField(ServerHost);\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n // 服务器端口\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"服务器端口:\\\", GUILayout.Width(100));\\n int newPort = EditorGUILayout.IntField(ServerPort);\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n EditorGUI.EndDisabledGroup();\\n\\n if (EditorGUI.EndChangeCheck())\\n {\\n IsEnabled = newEnabled;\\n AutoSuggest = newAutoSuggest;\\n ServerHost = newHost;\\n ServerPort = newPort;\\n\\n // 重新初始化\\n if (newEnabled)\\n {\\n isInitialized = false;\\n Initialize();\\n }\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n // 测试连接\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"测试连接\\\", GUILayout.Height(30)))\\n {\\n TestConnection();\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // 打开RAG窗口\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"打开RAG查询窗口\\\", GUILayout.Height(30)))\\n {\\n SkillRAGWindow.ShowWindow();\\n }\\n\\n // 清空缓存\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"清空本地缓存\\\", GUILayout.Height(25)))\\n {\\n SmartActionInspector.ClearCache();\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"完成\\\", \\\"本地缓存已清空\\\", \\\"确定\\\");\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n EditorGUILayout.HelpBox(\\n \\\"RAG（检索增强生成）系统提供基于AI的技能搜索和参数推荐功能。\\\\n\\\\n\\\" +\\n \\\"使用前请确保已启动Python RAG服务器。\\\",\\n MessageType.Info\\n );\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"查看RAG文档\\\"))\\n {\\n string docPath = Application.dataPath + \\\"/../SkillRAG/Docs/UserGuide.md\\\";\\n if (System.IO.File.Exists(docPath))\\n {\\n Application.OpenURL(\\\"file:///\\\" + docPath);\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"提示\\\", \\\"文档文件不存在\\\", \\\"确定\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n },\\n\\n keywords = new System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<string>(new[] { \\\"RAG\\\", \\\"AI\\\", \\\"技能\\\", \\\"推荐\\\", \\\"搜索\\\" })\\n };\\n\\n return provider;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 测试连接\\n /// </summary>\\n private static async UniTaskVoid TestConnection()\\n {\\n if (!isInitialized)\\n Initialize();\\n\\n try\\n {\\n // 在后台线程执行HTTP请求\\n string status = await UniTask.RunOnThreadPool(async () =>\\n {\\n return await ragClient.CheckHealthAsync();\\n });\\n\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"连接成功\\\",\\n $\\\"已成功连接到RAG服务器\\\\n状态: {status}\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\"\\n );\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"连接失败\\\",\\n $\\\"无法连接到RAG服务器\\\\n错误: {e.InnerException?.Message ?? e.Message}\\\\n\\\\n请确保Python服务器正在运行。\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\"\\n );\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[RAG] Connection error: {e}\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 在SkillEditor菜单中添加RAG相关选项\\n /// </summary>\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/打开RAG查询窗口\\\", false, 100)]\\n private static void OpenRAGWindow()\\n {\\n SkillRAGWindow.ShowWindow();\\n }\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/启用RAG功能\\\", false, 101)]\\n private static void ToggleRAGEnabled()\\n {\\n IsEnabled = !IsEnabled;\\n Menu.SetChecked(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/启用RAG功能\\\", IsEnabled);\\n\\n if (IsEnabled)\\n {\\n isInitialized = false;\\n Initialize();\\n }\\n }\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/启用RAG功能\\\", true)]\\n private static bool ToggleRAGEnabled_Validate()\\n {\\n Menu.SetChecked(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/启用RAG功能\\\", IsEnabled);\\n return true;\\n }\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/自动显示参数建议\\\", false, 102)]\\n private static void ToggleAutoSuggest()\\n {\\n AutoSuggest = !AutoSuggest;\\n Menu.SetChecked(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/自动显示参数建议\\\", AutoSuggest);\\n }\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/自动显示参数建议\\\", true)]\\n private static bool ToggleAutoSuggest_Validate()\\n {\\n Menu.SetChecked(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/自动显示参数建议\\\", AutoSuggest);\\n return IsEnabled;\\n }\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG功能/重建索引\\\", false, 110)]\\n private static async UniTaskVoid RebuildIndex()\\n {\\n if (!EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"确认\\\",\\n \\\"重建索引会扫描所有技能文件并更新向量数据库，这可能需要一些时间。\\\\n\\\\n是否继续？\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\",\\n \\\"取消\\\"))\\n {\\n return;\\n }\\n\\n if (!isInitialized)\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"索引完成\\\",\\n $\\\"成功索引 {response.count} 个技能\\\\n耗时: {response.elapsed_time:F2}秒\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\"\\n );\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n \"using System;\\nusing System.Collections;\\nusing System.Collections.Generic;\\nusing System.Diagnostics;\\nusing System.IO;\\nusing Cysharp.Threading.Tasks;\\nusing UnityEditor;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\nusing SkillSystem.Data;\\nusing SkillSystem.Editor;\\nusing Debug = UnityEngine.Debug;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.RAG\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 技能RAG查询窗口\\n /// 提供技能搜索和Action推荐功能\\n /// </summary>\\n public class SkillRAGWindow : EditorWindow\\n {\\n private EditorRAGClient client;\\n\\n // 服务器配置\\n private string serverHost = \\\"127.0.0.1\\\";\\n private int serverPort = 8765;\\n private bool isConnected = false;\\n\\n // 服务器进程管理\\n private Process serverProcess = null;\\n private bool isServerRunning = false;\\n private string serverOutput = \\\"\\\";\\n\\n // 定时ping相关\\n private double lastPingTime = 0;\\n private float pingInterval = 1.0f; // ping间隔（秒）\\n private bool isPinging = false;\\n\\n // 搜索相关\\n private string searchQuery = \\\"\\\";\\n private int searchTopK = 5;\\n private bool searchReturnDetails = true;\\n private List<EditorRAGClient.SearchResult> searchResults = new List<EditorRAGClient.SearchResult>();\\n private Vector2 searchScrollPos;\\n\\n // 推荐相关\\n private string recommendContext = \\\"\\\";\\n private int recommendTopK = 3;\\n private List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation> recommendations = new List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation>();\\n private Vector2 recommendScrollPos;\\n\\n // UI状态\\n private int selectedTab = 0;\\n private string[] tabNames = { \\\"技能搜索\\\", \\\"Action推荐\\\", \\\"管理\\\" };\\n private string statusMessage = \\\"\\\";\\n private bool isLoading = false;\\n\\n [MenuItem(\\\"技能系统/RAG查询窗口\\\", false, 102)]\\n public static void ShowWindow()\\n {\\n var window = GetWindow<SkillRAGWindow>(\\\"技能RAG\\\");\\n window.minSize = new Vector2(600, 400);\\n window.Show();\\n }\\n\\n private void OnEnable()\\n {\\n client = new EditorRAGClient(serverHost, serverPort);\\n\\n // 注册定时器用于定期ping服务器\\n EditorApplication.update += OnEditorUpdate;\\n\\n // 延迟执行连接检查，避免阻塞主线程\\n EditorApplication.delayCall += () => CheckConnectionAsync();\\n }\\n\\n private void OnDisable()\\n {\\n // 注销定时器\\n EditorApplication.update -= OnEditorUpdate;\\n\\n // 停止服务器进程\\n StopServer();\\n client?.Dispose();\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 编辑器更新回调，用于定时ping服务器\\n /// </summary>\\n private void OnEditorUpdate()\\n {\\n // 检查是否到了ping的时间\\n if (EditorApplication.timeSinceStartup - lastPingTime >= pingInterval)\\n {\\n lastPingTime = EditorApplication.timeSinceStartup;\\n\\n // 异步ping服务器\\n if (!isPinging)\\n {\\n PingServerAsync();\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n\\n private void OnGUI()\\n {\\n DrawToolbar();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // Tab选择\\n selectedTab = GUILayout.Toolbar(selectedTab, tabNames);\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n switch (selectedTab)\\n {\\n case 0:\\n DrawSearchTab();\\n break;\\n case 1:\\n DrawRecommendTab();\\n break;\\n case 2:\\n DrawManagementTab();\\n break;\\n }\\n\\n // 状态栏\\n DrawStatusBar();\\n }\\n\\n private void DrawToolbar()\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal(EditorStyles.toolbar);\\n\\n // 服务器管理按钮 - 检查进程状态\\n if (serverProcess != null && serverProcess.HasExited)\\n {\\n // 服务器进程意外退出\\n isServerRunning = false;\\n serverProcess.Dispose();\\n serverProcess = null;\\n if (isConnected)\\n {\\n isConnected = false;\\n statusMessage = \\\"服务器意外停止\\\";\\n }\\n }\\n\\n if (isServerRunning)\\n {\\n // 服务器运行中\\n GUIStyle runningStyle = new GUIStyle(EditorStyles.toolbarButton);\\n runningStyle.normal.textColor = Color.green;\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"● 服务器运行中\\\", runningStyle, GUILayout.Width(110)))\\n {\\n // 点击可查看输出\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[RAG Server] 输出:\\\\n{serverOutput}\\\");\\n }\\n\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"停止服务器\\\", EditorStyles.toolbarButton, GUILayout.Width(80)))\\n {\\n StopServer();\\n }\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n // 服务器未运行\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"启动服务器\\\", EditorStyles.toolbarButton, GUILayout.Width(80)))\\n {\\n StartServer();\\n }\\n }\\n\\n GUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n // 连接状态（带ping时间显示）\\n GUIStyle statusStyle = new GUIStyle(EditorStyles.label);\\n statusStyle.normal.textColor = isConnected ? Color.green : Color.red;\\n string statusText = isConnected ? \\\"● 已连接\\\" : \\\"● 未连接\\\";\\n GUILayout.Label(statusText, statusStyle);\\n\\n // 显示上次ping时间\\n if (lastPingTime > 0)\\n {\\n double timeSinceLastPing = EditorApplication.timeSinceStartup - lastPingTime;\\n GUILayout.Label($\\\"(ping: {timeSinceLastPing:F1}s前)\\\", EditorStyles.miniLabel, GUILayout.Width(80));\\n }\\n\\n GUILayout.FlexibleSpace();\\n\\n // 服务器配置\\n GUILayout.Label(\\\"服务器:\\\", GUILayout.Width(45));\\n serverHost = EditorGUILayout.TextField(serverHost, GUILayout.Width(100));\\n serverPort = EditorGUILayout.IntField(serverPort, GUILayout.Width(50));\\n\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"连接\\\", EditorStyles.toolbarButton, GUILayout.Width(50)))\\n {\\n client?.Dispose();\\n client = new EditorRAGClient(serverHost, serverPort);\\n CheckConnectionAsync();\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n }\\n\\n private void DrawSearchTab()\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"box\\\");\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"技能搜索\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // 搜索输入\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"搜索查询:\\\", GUILayout.Width(70));\\n searchQuery = EditorGUILayout.TextField(searchQuery);\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"返回数量:\\\", GUILayout.Width(70));\\n searchTopK = EditorGUILayout.IntSlider(searchTopK, 1, 20);\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n searchReturnDetails = EditorGUILayout.Toggle(\\\"返回详细信息\\\", searchReturnDetails);\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // 搜索按钮\\n GUI.enabled = !isLoading && !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(searchQuery) && isConnected;\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"搜索\\\", GUILayout.Height(30)))\\n {\\n PerformSearch();\\n }\\n GUI.enabled = true;\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n // 搜索结果\\n if (searchResults.Count > 0)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"搜索结果 ({searchResults.Count})\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n\\n searchScrollPos = EditorGUILayout.BeginScrollView(searchScrollPos);\\n\\n foreach (var result in searchResults)\\n {\\n DrawSearchResult(result);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndScrollView();\\n }\\n else if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(searchQuery) && !isLoading)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.HelpBox(\\\"没有找到匹配的技能\\\", MessageType.Info);\\n }\\n }\\n\\n private void DrawSearchResult(EditorRAGClient.SearchResult result)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"box\\\");\\n\\n // 标题行\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(result.skill_name, EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n GUILayout.FlexibleSpace();\\n\\n // 相似度标签\\n Color originalColor = GUI.backgroundColor;\\n GUI.backgroundColor = result.similarity >= 0.8f ? Color.green :\\n result.similarity >= 0.6f ? Color.yellow : Color.red;\\n GUILayout.Label($\\\"相似度: {result.similarity:P0}\\\", EditorStyles.miniButton, GUILayout.Width(80));\\n GUI.backgroundColor = originalColor;\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n // 详细信息\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"技能ID:\\\", GUILayout.Width(60));\\n EditorGUILayout.SelectableLabel(result.skill_id, GUILayout.Height(16));\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n if (searchReturnDetails)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"文件:\\\", GUILayout.Width(60));\\n EditorGUILayout.SelectableLabel(result.file_name, GUILayout.Height(16));\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"统计:\\\", GUILayout.Width(60));\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"{result.num_tracks} 轨道, {result.num_actions} 动作, {result.total_duration}帧\\\");\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n }\\n\\n // 操作按钮\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"打开技能文件\\\", GUILayout.Height(25)))\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"box\\\");\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"Action推荐\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // 上下文输入\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"描述你想要的效果:\\\", EditorStyles.label);\\n recommendContext = EditorGUILayout.TextArea(recommendContext, GUILayout.Height(60));\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"推荐数量:\\\", GUILayout.Width(70));\\n recommendTopK = EditorGUILayout.IntSlider(recommendTopK, 1, 10);\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n\\n // 推荐按钮\\n GUI.enabled = !isLoading && !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(recommendContext) && isConnected;\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"获取推荐\\\", GUILayout.Height(30)))\\n {\\n PerformRecommend();\\n }\\n GUI.enabled = true;\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n // 推荐结果\\n if (recommendations.Count > 0)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"推荐的Action类型 ({recommendations.Count})\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n\\n recommendScrollPos = EditorGUILayout.BeginScrollView(recommendScrollPos);\\n\\n foreach (var recommendation in recommendations)\\n {\\n DrawRecommendation(recommendation);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(5);\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndScrollView();\\n }\\n else if existingData.description;\\n entry.searchKeywords = existingData.searchKeywords;\\n entry.isAIGenerated = existingData.isAIGenerated;\\n entry.hasData = true;\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n // 尝试从Attribute获取\\n var displayAttr = type.GetCustomAttribute<ActionDisplayNameAttribute>();\\n var categoryAttr = type.GetCustomAttribute<ActionCategoryAttribute>();\\n\\n entry.displayName = displayAttr?.DisplayName ?? type.Name;\\n entry.category = categoryAttr?.Category ?? \\\"Other\\\";\\n entry.hasData = false;\\n }\\n\\n // 读取源代码\\n entry.sourceCode = ReadActionSourceCode(type);\\n\\n actionEntries.Add(entry);\\n }\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[Action描述管理器] 扫描完成，找到 {actionEntries.Count} 个Action\\\");\\n }\\n\\n private string ReadActionSourceCode(Type type)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n // 查找源文件\\n string[] guids = AssetDatabase.FindAssets($\\\"{type.Name} t:MonoScript\\\");\\n if (guids.Length == 0)\\n return null;\\n\\n string path = AssetDatabase.GUIDToAssetPath(guids[0]);\\n return File.ReadAllText(path);\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogWarning($\\\"[Action描述管理器] 无法读取 {type.Name} 的源代码: {e.Message}\\\");\\n return null;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region AI生成\\n\\n private async UniTaskVoid GenerateAllMissingDescriptionsAsync()\\n {\\n var client = new DeepSeekClient(deepSeekApiKey);\\n\\n int successCount = 0;\\n int failCount = 0;\\n\\n var missingEntries = actionEntries.Where(e => string.IsNullOrEmpty(e.description)).ToList();\\n int total = missingEntries.Count;\\n\\n for (int i = 0; i < missingEntries.Count; i++)\\n {\\n var entry = missingEntries[i];\\n\\n try\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayProgressBar(\\n \\\"AI生成描述\\\",\\n $\\\"正在生成 {entry.typeName} 的描述... ({i + 1}/{total})\\\",\\n (float)i / total\\n );\\n\\n if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(entry.sourceCode))\\n {\\n Debug.LogWarning($\\\"[Action描述管理器] 跳过 {entry.typeName}：无法读取源代码\\\");\\n failCount++;\\n continue;\\n }\\n\\n // 调用DeepSeek生成描述\\n var result = await client.GenerateActionDescriptionAsync(\\n entry.typeName,\\n entry.sourceCode,\\n entry.displayName,\\n entry.category\\n );\\n\\n if (result.success)\\n {\\n entry.displayName = result.displayName;\\n entry.category = result.category;\\n entry.description = result.description;\\n entry.searchKeywords = result.searchKeywords;\\n entry.isAIGenerated = true;\\n entry.hasData = true;\\n successCount++;\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[Action描述管理器] ✅ 成功生成 {entry.typeName} 的描述\\\");\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[Action描述管理器] ❌ 生成 {entry.typeName} 失败: {result.error}\\\");\\n failCount++;\\n }\\n\\n // 避免API限流\\n await UniTask.Delay(1000);\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[Action描述管理器] ❌ 生成 {entry.typeName} 异常: {e.Message}\\\");\\n failCount++;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n EditorUtility.ClearProgressBar();\\n\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"AI生成完成\\\",\\n $\\\"成功生成: {successCount} 个\\\\n失败: {failCount} 个\\\\n\\\\n请检查生成结果并手动优化，然后保存到数据库。\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\"\\n );\\n\\n Repaint();\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region 保存\\n\\n private void SaveAllToDatabase()\\n {\\n if (database == null)\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"错误\\\", \\\"数据库未加载\\\", \\\"确定\\\");\\n return;\\n }\\n\\n int savedCount = 0;\\n\\n foreach (var entry in actionEntries)\\n {\\n if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(entry.description))\\n continue;\\n\\n var data = new ActionDescriptionData\\n {\\n typeName = entry.typeName,\\n namespaceName = entry.namespaceName,\\n displayName = entry.displayName,\\n category = entry.category,\\n description = entry.description,\\n searchKeywords = entry.searchKeywords,\\n isAIGenerated = entry.isAIGenerated,\\n aiGeneratedTime = entry.isAIGenerated ? DateTime.Now.ToString(\\\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\\") : \\\"\\\",\\n lastModifiedTime = DateTime.Now.ToString(\\\"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss\\\"),\\n lastModifiedBy = Environment.UserName\\n };\\n\\n database.AddOrUpdateAction(data);\\n savedCount++;\\n }\\n\\n // 清理不存在的Action\\n var validTypeNames = actionEntries.Select(e => e.typeName).ToList();\\n database.CleanupMissingActions(validTypeNames);\\n\\n EditorUtility.SetDirty(database);\\n AssetDatabase.SaveAssets();\\n\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\n \\\"保存成功\\\",\\n $\\\"已保存 {savedCount} 个Action的描述到数据库\\\\n\\\\n数据库路径: {DATABASE_PATH}\\\",\\n \\\"确定\\\"\\n );\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[Action描述管理器] 保存完成: {savedCount} 个Action\\\");\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n\\n #region 内部类\\n\\n [Serializable]\\n private class ActionEntry\\n {\\n [TableColumnWidth(120, Resizable = false)]\\n [ReadOnly]\\n [LabelText(\\\"Action类型\\\")]\\n public string typeName;\\n\\n [HideInTables]\\n [ReadOnly]\\n public string namespaceName;\\n\\n [HideInTables]\\n [ReadOnly]\\n public string fullTypeName;\\n\\n [TableColumnWidth(100)]\\n [LabelText(\\\"显示名称\\\")]\\n public string displayName;\\n\\n [TableColumnWidth(100)]\\n [LabelText(\\\"分类\\\")]\\n public string category;\\n\\n [TableColumnWidth(300)]\\n [MultiLineProperty(3)]\\n [LabelText(\\\"功能描述\\\")]\\n public string description;\\n\\n [HideInTables]\\n [LabelText(\\\"搜索关键词\\\")]\\n public string searchKeywords;\\n\\n [TableColumnWidth(80)]\\n [ReadOnly]\\n [LabelText(\\\"状态\\\")]\\n [ShowInInspector]\\n public string Status => hasData ? (isAIGenerated ? \\\"AI生成\\\" : \\\"手动编写\\\") : \\\"待生成\\\";\\n\\n [HideInTables]\\n [Button(\\\"AI生成描述\\\", ButtonSizes.Small)]\\n [EnableIf(\\\"@!string.IsNullOrEmpty(sourceCode)\\\")]\\n private void GenerateDescription()\\n {\\n GenerateSingleDescriptionAsync().Forget();\\n }\\n\\n private async UniTaskVoid GenerateSingleDescriptionAsync()\\n {\\n var window = GetWindow<ActionDescriptionGeneratorWindow>();\\n var client = new DeepSeekClient(window.deepSeekApiKey);\\n\\n try\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayProgressBar(\\\"AI生成描述\\\", $\\\"正在生成 {typeName} 的描述...\\\", 0.5f);\\n\\n var result = await client.GenerateActionDescriptionAsync(\\n typeName,\\n sourceCode,\\n displayName,\\n category\\n );\\n\\n if (result.success)\\n {\\n displayName = result.displayName;\\n category = result.category;\\n description = result.description;\\n searchKeywords = result.searchKeywords;\\n isAIGenerated = true;\\n hasData = true;\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[Action描述管理器] ✅ 成功生成 {typeName} 的描述\\\");\\n window.Repaint();\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"生成失败\\\", $\\\"错误: {result.error}\\\", \\\"确定\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n catch (Exception e)\\n {\\n EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(\\\"生成异常\\\", e.Message, \\\"确定\\\");\\n }\\n finally\\n {\\n EditorUtility.ClearProgressBar();\\n }\\n }\\n\\n [HideInInspector]\\n public string sourceCode;\\n\\n [HideInInspector]\\n public bool hasData;\\n\\n [HideInInspector]\\n public bool isAIGenerated;\\n }\\n\\n #endregion\\n }\\n}\\n\\n... \"using System.Collections.Generic;\\nusing Cysharp.Threading.Tasks;\\nusing UnityEditor;\\nusing UnityEngine;\\n\\nnamespace SkillSystem.RAG\\n{\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 智能Action检查器\\n /// 在ActionInspector中提供AI参数推荐功能\\n /// </summary>\\n public class SmartActionInspector\\n {\\n private static EditorRAGClient ragClient;\\n private static Dictionary<string, List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation>> paramSuggestionsCache;\\n private static bool isInitialized = false;\\n\\n // UI状态\\n private static bool showSmartSuggestions = true;\\n private static Vector2 suggestionsScrollPos;\\n private static bool isLoadingSuggestions = false;\\n private static string currentActionType = \\\"\\\";\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 初始化智能检查器\\n /// </summary>\\n public static void Initialize()\\n {\\n if (isInitialized)\\n return;\\n\\n ragClient = new EditorRAGClient();\\n paramSuggestionsCache = new Dictionary<string, List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation>>();\\n isInitialized = true;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 绘制智能建议UI（在ActionInspector中调用）\\n /// </summary>\\n /// <param name=\\\"action\\\">当前编辑的Action</param>\\n public static void DrawSmartSuggestions(SkillSystem.Actions.ISkillAction action)\\n {\\n if (!isInitialized)\\n Initialize();\\n\\n if (action == null)\\n return;\\n\\n string actionType = action.GetType().Name;\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(10);\\n\\n // 折叠栏\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"box\\\");\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n showSmartSuggestions = EditorGUILayout.Foldout(showSmartSuggestions, \\\" AI参数建议\\\", true, EditorStyles.foldoutHeader);\\n\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"刷新\\\", EditorStyles.miniButton, GUILayout.Width(50)))\\n {\\n RefreshSuggestions(actionType);\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n\\n if (showSmartSuggestions)\\n {\\n EditorGUI.indentLevel++;\\n\\n // 检查是否有缓存的建议\\n if (paramSuggestionsCache.ContainsKey(actionType))\\n {\\n DrawCachedSuggestions(actionType, action);\\n }\\n else if (!isLoadingSuggestions)\\n {\\n // 首次加载\\n EditorGUILayout.HelpBox(\\\"点击\\\\\\\"刷新\\\\\\\"获取AI参数建议\\\", MessageType.Info);\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField(\\\"正在加载建议...\\\", EditorStyles.miniLabel);\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUI.indentLevel--;\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 绘制缓存的建议\\n /// </summary>\\n private static void DrawCachedSuggestions(string actionType, SkillSystem.Actions.ISkillAction action)\\n {\\n var suggestions = paramSuggestionsCache[actionType];\\n\\n if (suggestions == null || suggestions.Count == 0)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.HelpBox(\\\"没有找到相关的参数建议\\\", MessageType.Info);\\n return;\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"基于 {GetTotalFrequency(suggestions)} 个相似案例的建议:\\\", EditorStyles.miniLabel);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(3);\\n\\n suggestionsScrollPos = EditorGUILayout.BeginScrollView(\\n suggestionsScrollPos,\\n GUILayout.MaxHeight(200)\\n );\\n\\n // 只显示当前Action类型的建议\\n foreach (var suggestion in suggestions)\\n {\\n if (suggestion.action_type == actionType)\\n {\\n DrawActionSuggestion(suggestion, action);\\n }\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndScrollView();\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 绘制单个Action建议\\n /// </summary>\\n private static void DrawActionSuggestion(EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation suggestion, SkillSystem.Actions.ISkillAction action)\\n {\\n if (suggestion.examples == null || suggestion.examples.Count == 0)\\n return;\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"box\\\");\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"常见参数配置 (出现 {suggestion.frequency} 次)\\\", EditorStyles.boldLabel);\\n\\n foreach (var example in suggestion.examples)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginVertical(\\\"helpBox\\\");\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"来源: {example.skill_name}\\\", EditorStyles.miniLabel);\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(2);\\n\\n if (example.parameters != null && example.parameters.Count > 0)\\n {\\n EditorGUI.indentLevel++;\\n\\n foreach (var param in example.parameters)\\n {\\n EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.LabelField($\\\"{param.Key}:\\\", GUILayout.Width(150));\\n\\n // 显示值\\n string valueStr = param.Value?.ToString() ?? \\\"null\\\";\\n EditorGUILayout.SelectableLabel(valueStr, EditorStyles.miniLabel, GUILayout.Height(16));\\n\\n // 应用按钮\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"应用\\\", EditorStyles.miniButton, GUILayout.Width(40)))\\n {\\n ApplyParameterToAction(action, param.Key, param.Value);\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUI.indentLevel--;\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();\\n EditorGUILayout.Space(3);\\n }\\n\\n // 全部应用按钮\\n if (suggestion.examples.Count > 0 && suggestion.examples[0].parameters != null)\\n {\\n if (GUILayout.Button(\\\"应用此配置的所有参数\\\", GUILayout.Height(25)))\\n {\\n ApplyAllParameters(action, suggestion.examples[0].parameters);\\n }\\n }\\n\\n EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 刷新建议\\n /// </summary>\\n private static async UniTaskVoid RefreshSuggestions(string actionType)\\n {\\n if (isLoadingSuggestions)\\n return;\\n\\n isLoadingSuggestions = true;\\n currentActionType = actionType;\\n\\n // 构建上下文查询\\n string context = GetActionContextQuery(actionType);\\n\\n try\\n {\\n // 在后台线程执行HTTP请求\\n var response = await UniTask.RunOnThreadPool(async () =>\\n {\\n return await ragClient.RecommendActionsAsync(context, 3);\\n });\\n\\n paramSuggestionsCache[actionType] = response.recommendations;\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 获取到 {response.recommendations.Count} 个建议\\\");\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 获取建议异常: {e}\\\");\\n paramSuggestionsCache[actionType] = new List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation>();\\n }\\n finally\\n {\\n isLoadingSuggestions = false;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 根据Action类型构建上下文查询\\n /// </summary>\\n private static string GetActionContextQuery(string actionType)\\n {\\n // 移除\\\"Action\\\"后缀\\n string baseName = actionType.Replace(\\\"Action\\\", \\\"\\\");\\n\\n // 根据Action类型返回对应的中文描述\\n var contextMap = new Dictionary<string, string>\\n {\\n { \\\"Damage\\\", \\\"造成伤害的技能效果\\\" },\\n { \\\"Heal\\\", \\\"治疗恢复生命值\\\" },\\n { \\\"Movement\\\", \\\"移动角色位置\\\" },\\n { \\\"Projectile\\\", \\\"发射弹道飞行物\\\" },\\n { \\\"AreaOfEffect\\\", \\\"范围效果作用于区域\\\" },\\n { \\\"Buff\\\", \\\"增益或减益状态效果\\\" },\\n { \\\"Shield\\\", \\\"护盾吸收伤害\\\" },\\n { \\\"Summon\\\", \\\"召唤单位\\\" },\\n { \\\"Teleport\\\", \\\"瞬移传送\\\" },\\n { \\\"Animation\\\", \\\"播放动画效果\\\" },\\n { \\\"Audio\\\", \\\"播放音效\\\" },\\n { \\\"Camera\\\", \\\"相机震动或缩放\\\" },\\n { \\\"Control\\\", \\\"控制输入限制\\\" },\\n { \\\"Collision\\\", \\\"碰撞检测\\\" },\\n { \\\"Resource\\\", \\\"资源消耗或生成\\\" }\\n };\\n\\n return contextMap.ContainsKey(baseName) ? contextMap[baseName] : $\\\"{baseName} 相关效果\\\";\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 应用参数到Action\\n /// </summary>\\n private static void ApplyParameterToAction(SkillSystem.Actions.ISkillAction action, string paramName, object paramValue)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n var field = action.GetType().GetField(paramName);\\n\\n if (field != null)\\n {\\n // 类型转换\\n object convertedValue = ConvertValue(paramValue, field.FieldType);\\n\\n if (convertedValue != null)\\n {\\n // Note: ISkillAction is not a UnityEngine.Object, so we can't use Undo\\n // The changes will be applied directly to the action data\\n field.SetValue(action, convertedValue);\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 已应用参数: {paramName} = {paramValue}\\\");\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n Debug.LogWarning($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 无法转换参数类型: {paramName}\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n Debug.LogWarning($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 未找到字段: {paramName}\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogError($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 应用参数失败: {e.Message}\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 应用所有参数\\n /// </summary>\\n private static void ApplyAllParameters(SkillSystem.Actions.ISkillAction action, Dictionary<string, object> parameters)\\n {\\n // Note: ISkillAction is not a UnityEngine.Object, so we can't use Undo\\n // The changes will be applied directly to the action data\\n\\n int appliedCount = 0;\\n\\n foreach (var param in parameters)\\n {\\n try\\n {\\n var field = action.GetType().GetField(param.Key);\\n\\n if (field != null)\\n {\\n object convertedValue = ConvertValue(param.Value, field.FieldType);\\n\\n if (convertedValue != null)\\n {\\n field.SetValue(action, convertedValue);\\n appliedCount++;\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n catch (System.Exception e)\\n {\\n Debug.LogWarning($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 应用参数 {param.Key} 失败: {e.Message}\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n\\n Debug.Log($\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 已应用 {appliedCount}/{parameters.Count} 个参数\\\");\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 类型转换辅助方法\\n /// </summary>\\n private static object ConvertValue(object value, System.Type targetType)\\n {\\n if (value == null)\\n return null;\\n\\n try\\n {\\n // 如果类型已匹配\\n if (targetType.IsAssignableFrom(value.GetType()))\\n return value;\\n\\n // 字符串转换\\n if (value is string strValue)\\n {\\n if (targetType == typeof(int))\\n return int.Parse(strValue);\\n if (targetType == typeof(float))\\n return float.Parse(strValue);\\n if (targetType == typeof(double))\\n return double.Parse(strValue);\\n if (targetType == typeof(bool))\\n return bool.Parse(strValue);\\n if (targetType.IsEnum)\\n return System.Enum.Parse(targetType, strValue);\\n }\\n\\n // 数值类型转换\\n if (targetType == typeof(float) && (value is int || value is double))\\n return System.Convert.ToSingle(value);\\n\\n if (targetType == typeof(int) && (value is float || value is double))\\n return System.Convert.ToInt32(value);\\n\\n // 枚举转换\\n if (targetType.IsEnum && value is string enumStr)\\n return System.Enum.Parse(targetType, enumStr);\\n\\n // 默认转换\\n return System.Convert.ChangeType(value, targetType);\\n }\\n catch\\n {\\n return null;\\n }\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 获取总频率\\n /// </summary>\\n private static int GetTotalFrequency(List<EditorRAGClient.ActionRecommendation> suggestions)\\n {\\n int total = 0;\\n foreach (var suggestion in suggestions)\\n {\\n total += suggestion.frequency;\\n }\\n return total;\\n }\\n\\n /// <summary>\\n /// 清空缓存\\n /// </summary>\\n public static void ClearCache()\\n {\\n paramSuggestionsCache?.Clear();\\n Debug.Log(\\\"[SmartActionInspector] 缓存已清空\\\");\\n }\\n }\\n}\\n\\n...
